title: kailAsa shiva gaurishankarA
sahitya:
kailAsa shiva gaurishankarA gangAdharA karuNAkarA Om


anupallavi

  uyirgaLai ellAm uDalAgak-koNDE ulagAlayattil pala vAyulAvum


caraNam    nAvinun peyarai navilvaden magizhvAm Aviyil unai nAn AshaiyAik-kalandE
bhuviyil un pugazhE pughalvaden pugazhAm pAvana mAdalen paramAnandamAm
